events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was hit by another vehicle at an intersection yesterday.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident based on the details submitted by the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle this particular auto accident claim for further assistance.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will start processing it immediately.
Please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and insurance documents to proceed.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including police report and repair estimates.
Our team has begun investigation into the motor vehicle collision to verify the details provided.
Investigation completed confirming that the accident occurred as reported with no discrepancies found.
A settlement amount for vehicle repairs has been proposed to the claimant for review and approval.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick response.
The claim has been approved after all conditions were met and documents validated thoroughly.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim has been successfully issued to the claimant's account.
The auto accident claim case is now closed following payment and confirmation from the claimant.
The claim documents and case records have been archived in the system for future reference.
